message.body: Hey Chris, we are done at the Whitney and might want to drop our stuff at your place if u are around
sure. How long until you get here? ?o prob
I'm not sure, maybe 1hr or more
U know how to get here? Are u driving?
We are taking the train. The jmz right?
Yepp. But the M does not run on the weekend. So take something to the JZ and transfer
Were also a 15 minute walk from the Ltrain
Ok we're right by the 456 so we'll take that to the JZ
Sounds about right. Walk down broadway towards the bridge when u get to bk. About 6 blocks
